name: FinD'Robbers
description: It all began when there was a robbery in the neighborhood, the police suspected 6 people who live in a Mansion. “There were 2 people entering my room at night of the robbery it was a bit fague since I'm half asleep” says an eye witness who were sleeping in one of the room. That means 4 of them are innocent. Now, YOU are the detective that the police hired to capture all 2 of the robbers, you also has a high reputation as a detective. Capture the robber and free the innocent with clues given in the game, do not let the robbers get away from your inspection!
